posts.post_title: FS - Bender Portrait SGC 5 / Mathewson Portrait SGC 3
posts.post_content:
Bender SGC 5 - asking 1.6k (psa 5 sold for 2.6k this week)
Mathewson SGC 3 - asking 2.6k

Mathewson is an exceptional example, with a clean surface and well-centered.

All accepted offers will include shipping/signature confirmation. 

Payment methods accepted - venmo, zelle, certified check. Paypal G/S ok (prefer fees covered)

Please message for any additional questions or images. thanks!
